Uses of Package
teal.render.j3d

  • Packages that use teal.render.j3d 
    Package Description
    teal.physics.mech
    Provides mechanical (kinematic) objects that can be added to the world.
    teal.plot
    Provides specific PlotItem implementations for use in a Graph.
    teal.render.j3d
    Provides Java3D implementations of TEALsim rendered objects, Viewer and support classes.
    teal.render.viewer
    Provides the specification for generic 2D & 3D viewers and an Abstract 3D viewer and related behaviors.
    teal.sim.spatial
    Spatial objects do not have a physical 'body' but are used to represent field values and data visualizations.
    tealsim.physics.em
    Electromagnetism simulations.
    tealsim.physics.examples
    This package consists of examples of simulations constructing using the elements of TEALsim.
    tealsim.physics.testplay  
  • Classes in teal.render.j3d used by teal.physics.mech 
    Class and Description
    ArrowNode
    provides SceneGraphNode for the management of a single arrow, may be used stand-alone for a vector representation or as individual nodes in an array of arrows.
    InclinedPlaneNode
    This node creates the inclined plane used in the InclinedPlane applet.
  • Classes in teal.render.j3d used by teal.plot 
    Class and Description
    ShapeNode
    provides SceneGraphNode for the management of a single Element which contains at most one Shape3D and provides access to the shape's methods.
  • Classes in teal.render.j3d used by teal.render.j3d 
    Class and Description
    ArrowNode
    provides SceneGraphNode for the management of a single arrow, may be used stand-alone for a vector representation or as individual nodes in an array of arrows.
    FogBehavior
    This is a behavior for keeping the FOG at bay.
    FrameCheck 
    HasCanvas 
    HasPickCanvas 
    HasUniverse 
    LineNode
    provides SceneGraphNode for the management of a single line, may be used stand-alone for a vector representation or as individual nodes in an array of arrows.
    Node3D
    The Node3D provides general position and rotation management it provides a TransformGroup for the management of a Rendered object, child Nodes are added to this group.
    ShapeNode
    provides SceneGraphNode for the management of a single Element which contains at most one Shape3D and provides access to the shape's methods.
    ShapeNode3D
    provides SceneGraphNode for the management of a single Element which contains at most one Shape3D and provides access to the shape's methods.
    TransformGizmo
    The TransformGizmo provides a TransformGroup for use by behaviors, contents are children of an internal transformGroup which may be manipulatied independently from the base TransformGroup.
    WallNode
    Node for rendering a Wall, which is just a rectangular plane.
  • Classes in teal.render.j3d used by teal.render.viewer 
    Class and Description
    HasCanvas 
    HasPickCanvas 
    HasUniverse 
    MoveGizmo
    This node is used for rendering the "movement gizmo", an indicator of orientation that appears when an object in the viewer is selected.
  • Classes in teal.render.j3d used by teal.sim.spatial 
    Class and Description
    ArrayNode
    provides SceneGraphNode for the management of a dynamic group or array of TNodes.
    FieldLineNode
    provides SceneGraphNode for the management of a FieldLine, includes support for displaying pick shape, symmetry, and line direction markers.
    GridNode
    this provides a general Node for representing a rectangular grid of information, an indexed geometry array will be used for the geometry.
    LineNode
    provides SceneGraphNode for the management of a single line, may be used stand-alone for a vector representation or as individual nodes in an array of arrows.
    Node3D
    The Node3D provides general position and rotation management it provides a TransformGroup for the management of a Rendered object, child Nodes are added to this group.

    Class and Description
    AmpereanCircleNode3D
    This is the Node3D class for the Amperean Circle line integral
    AmpereanRectangleNode3D
    This is the Node3D class for the Amperean Rectangle line integral
